title: essential security capabilities
extract: Here are some ways Microsoft Security Essentials helps keep your PCs safe without getting in your way or making you worry.Real-time protection. ... System scanning. ... Windows Firewall integration. ... Dynamic signature service. ... Protection against real threats, not good software.Aug 17, 2017
extract_html:
Here are some ways Microsoft Security Essentials helps keep your PCs safe without getting in your way or making you worry.
  • Real-time protection. ...
  • System scanning. ...
  • Windows Firewall integration. ...
  • Dynamic signature service. ...
  • Protection against real threats, not good software.
Aug 17, 2017
